name: Advanced Community
body:
This package contains modules to extend your papaya CMS community.

# Features
- Improved surfer details page
- Improved surfer contacts management
- Messages between surfers grouped by conversations
- Private or public groups for surfers
- Image galleries for surfers and groups
- Comments for pages, surfers, images and groups
- Comments and commenters ranking
- Notifications by message or email
- Surfers list with filter and search
- Last activities and registrations list
- Intelligent caching support
- Cleanup cronjob for old cache data

# Installation

Please read the installation manual here http://goo.gl/z1vSE (english version)
or here http://goo.gl/mMOjm (german version)

# Alternative theme

The package contains a support for the papaya CMS default-theme.
An alternative theme to this is the bootstrap-theme using
bootstrap by Twitter, get it here http://goo.gl/CA6Vy

# License

This module is offered under GNU General Public Licence
(GPL). The detailed license text can be found in gpl.txt
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
